recipe.name: Vegan Lasagna
recipe.description: A hearty and flavorful plant-based lasagna featuring layers of lentils, mixed vegetables, spinach, and a creamy vegan béchamel sauce.
steps: Boil the chopped carrot, onion, and zucchini for 5-7 minutes until soft. Add the lentils and bring to a gentle simmer, adding a stock cube if desired. Continue cooking and stirring until the lentils are soft, about 20 minutes.
Blanch the spinach leaves in a pan for a few minutes, then remove and set aside.
In the same pan, top up with water and cook the lasagne sheets according to package instructions. Drain and set aside once cooked.

To make the béchamel sauce, melt the vegan butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Add the flour and stir to form a roux. Gradually whisk in the soya milk, then add the mustard and vinegar. Cook and stir until the sauce is smooth and thickened.

Assemble the lasagna in a baking dish by layering the lentil and vegetable mixture, blanched spinach, lasagne sheets, and béchamel sauce. Repeat the layers as desired, ending with a layer of béchamel sauce on top.
Bake in the preheated oven for about 25 minutes until golden and bubbling.
Allow the lasagna to rest for a few minutes before serving.
Your hard work has paid off—time to enjoy!
